title: Bug 123840Incorrect use of static fields in NEvaluator and FilterPassController
description: Bug 123840Incorrect use of static fields in NEvaluator and FilterPassController This is not multithread safe.
OB: Data Engine classes org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.script.NEvaluator and FilterPassController (used for topn and bottomn filter process) use static class fields to store proessing data.
EB: If there are concurrent requests running in the same JVM (even if they use different instances of DataEngine), data corruption will occur since multiple requests may get/set the static fields at the same time.These classes should keep all perrequest data in instance fields. Each report query need to have its own instance.
